value.title: Introducing New Format Pane in Power BI Desktop
value.excerpt: During this video, we will talk about the new format pane in Power BI Desktop. Now we have consistent and easier formatting experience for our Power BI report. During this video, I will demonstrate all-new enhancements that has been rolled out as New format pane preview. We will also compare the new

value.title: Make a Table Visualization to Display All Observations from Data Source in Power BI
value.excerpt: In this session, I’m demonstrating how we can show all the records even if it is the same as the Power BI table. We all know that the Power BI table visual automatically removes the duplicate rows from end-users in the table. But sometimes we need to show the end-users all the values from the data source

value.title: New way to compare Date and DateTime Value in Power BI - August 2021 Feature Summary
value.excerpt: Welcome to one more new update from Power BI Desktop. Sometimes we need to compare date or DateTime value in our DAX expression. At that time, we are using Date() function and Time() function. Now, there's one more easy way to compare Date and Time value in Power BI which is using "dt" keyword before

value.excerpt: In this video, first we will talk What is a Power BI App? An App is a Power BI content type which allows to combine dashboards, reports all in one place bundled together. value.title: Power BI Goals - Create Scorecard and Manual Goals in Power BI
value.excerpt: Welcome to the Power BI Goals Step by Step Beginner tutorial series, During this session, we will talk about how to create Scorecard and Manual Goals in Power BI. To get started with Goals we need to create a Scorecard in Power BI. Once ou scorecard is created, we can add the Goals within the same scorecard.

value.title: Power BI Tip - Hide Filter Pane From the Published Version of Power BI Report
value.excerpt: In this vlog we will learn about how we can hide the Filter Pane from the published version of the Power BI report. Sometimes there are situations in which we have set our Visual, Page or Report level filter as a part of development logic and we wish that end user should not able to change those values.

value.title: Are you backing up your Power BI Dataset???
value.excerpt: While Power BI is a SaaS service, backing up your dataset is still important. What if something was accidently deleted? How do you recover it? Patrick shows you how you can get a backup / restore process in place so you can sleep at night.  Backup/Restore PowerShell Script: https://guyinacu.be/backuprestorescript
